description: Servers overview detailed stats for MetricZ

panels.description: Metrics update duration in game server

targets.expr: max by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_update_duration_seconds{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})

panels.title: Update Duration

panels.description: Mission updates per one second (per one scrape)

targets.expr: sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_weapon_shots_all_total{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (rate(dayz_metricz_weapon_shots_all_total{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_weapons{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_magazines{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_optics{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_suppressors{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_ammo{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_ammo_boxes{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_explosives{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_explosives_detonated_total{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
